Uses of Package
comunication

Packages that use comunication
comunication   
domain   
system   
 

Classes in comunication used by comunication
IComunicator
          This interface define all methods for IComunicator.
NetworkProtocol
          This enum define all network protocols managed by the middleware for interact with Arduino board.
TransportLayer
          This class resolves comunication protocol request for sending/receiving bytes to/from Arduino and manages events for PUSH notifications.
TransportLayerEvent
          This class represents events generated by TransportLayer.
TransportLayerEventSource
          Thiss interface defines methods for add and remove listeners who are interested in the event of the TransportLayer.
TransportLayerListener
          This interface defines methods that is executed when an event is verified.
UdpComunicator
           
UdpPushEvent
          This class implements all methods for events generated by Push Comunicator UDP.
UdpPushEventSource
          This interface defines methods for adding/deleting UdpPushListener from listener's list.
UdpPushListener
          This interface defines methods for manage an event generated by UdpPushEventSource.
 

Classes in comunication used by domain
IPushNotification
          This interface defines all methods for a device that manages PUSH notification.
TransportLayerEvent
          This class represents events generated by TransportLayer.
TransportLayerListener
          This interface defines methods that is executed when an event is verified.
 

Classes in comunication used by system
NetworkProtocol
          This enum define all network protocols managed by the middleware for interact with Arduino board.
